text: The Greek women's national basketball team is the representative for Greece in international women's basketball competitions and it is organized and run by the Greek Basketball Federation. ==Participation in international competitions== The Greek women's national basketball team participating in the FIBA EuroBasket Women 2011 contest. ===Olympic Games=== {| class="wikitable"
